title: Protester disrupts Britsh prime minister's conference speech
description:
(4 Oct 2017) British prime minister Theresa May's keynote speech at her party conference was disrupted Wednesday when a protester handed her a notice apparently calling for her to resign. 
The protester gave her a P45, an official document used by companies when they make employees redundant. 
The heckler was dragged away by security officials.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/6eda57792a7dea90e3bdacf80a9fde56 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
